def_cn: (目视他人使其遭殃的)恶毒目光;邪眼
def_en: Some people believe that the evil eye is a magical power to cast a spell on someone or something by looking at them, so that bad things happen to them.

def_cn: 不悦的眼光;忌妒的眼神
def_en: If someone gives you the evil eye, they look at you in an unpleasant way, usually because they dislike you or are jealous of you.
